snippet: In “Flight,” the first live-action feature by Robert Zemeckis (“Back to the Future,” “Forrest Gump”) since 2000, Denzel Washington plays a pilot who crash-lands his commercial plane without a single fatality.
abstract: In “Flight,” the first live-action feature by Robert Zemeckis (“Back to the Future,” “Forrest Gump”) since 2000, Denzel Washington plays a pilot who crash-lands his commercial plane without a single fatality.

headline.main: Robert Zemeckis Movie 'Flight,' With Denzel Washington, Will Close New York Film Festival
headline.print_headline: Spoiler! Closing Film Named Before Opener
